FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 21-08-2024 13:15:15   (GMT +5:30)
REFERΕNCE NO: 17723588 


ATTN CHARTERING DESK
DEAR SIR
GOOD DAY
DIRECT OWNERS VESSEL
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE CARGO FOR BELOW VESSEL

MV

 WESTERN DURBAN  - HDY - OPEN COCHIN, INDIA – 28 - 31 AUG 2024
LAST 3 CARGOES: ROCK PHOSPHATE / WHEAT / PIG IRON

- PREFER TRIP W/I PMO-JAPAN RANGE WITH CLEAN CARGO, TRY ANY

- OHBS

- COILS 2X20 - OK

 

MV WESTERN DURBAN

PHILIPPINES FLAG

CLASS: BUREAU VERITAS

DWT: 39266 MT ON SUMMER DRAFT 10.618 M (TPC:51.6)

LOA/BEAM/DEPTH(M): 179.90 / 30.00 / 14.80

BUILT: JUNE 2015

BUILT YARD: JIANGMEN NANYANG SHIP ENGINEERING CO., LTD.

GT/NT : 24868 / 12926

5HOLDS/HATCHES

GRAIN/BALE(CBF): 1700291 / 1659949

CRANE: 4 X 30 .5T SWA (HOOK)

M/E: MAN B&W 5S50ME-B9.2

GRAB: SMAG 4X 12 CBM

ALL DETAILS ABOUT

 

FULL SPEED & CONSUMPTION (GUARANTEED)

BALLAST ABOUT 14.0 KNOTS ON ABOUT 23.0MTS.

LADEN ABOUT 13.5 KNOTS / ABOUT 22.5MT

ECO SPEED & CONSUMPTION (GUARANTEED)

BALLAST ABOUT 12.0 KNOTS / ABOUT 16.5MT

LADEN ABOUT 11.5 KNOTS / ABOUT 16.0MT

PORT CONSUMPTION

IDLE ABOUT 3.0MT PER DAY

WORKING ABOUT 4.0MT PER DAY

 

ALL SPEED / CONSUMPTION ARE GIVEN BASIS GOOD WEATHER CONDITION FOR 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS UP TO BEAUFORT 4 / DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 /

CURRENTS CAN & WILL BE FACTORED IN UPON VOYAGE EVALUATION TO REFLECT THE TRUE PERFORMANCE OF THE VESSEL.

ANY GAIN ON TIME AND/OR CONSUMPTION TO BE OFF-SET AGAINST LOSS ON TIME AND/OR CONSUMPTION IF ANY.　

ABOUT IS DEFINED AS +/- 0.5 KNOT ON THE SPEED AND +/- 5% ON THE CONSUMPTION FIGURE.

VESSEL MAY USE MGO WHEN ENTERING/LEAVING PORT, MANEUVERING AND IN NARROW, SHALLOW OR CONGESTED WATERS, RIVERS, STRAITS, CANAL, STARTING /

STOPPING ME AND AUX, DURING ROUGH WEATHER / POOR VISIBILITY, USING INCINERATOR, WHEN BALLASTING /DE-BALLASTING /

HOLD CLEANING, HEATING FUEL IN COLD WEATHER, FAMILIARIZATION, MAINTENANCE AND OTHERS IN CASE OF REASONABLY NEED.



PLSD TO HEAR.
 
BEST REGARDS,
